name: PlayGod
description:
Controls:

-w/a/s/d-move camera

-f/r-Change sun's positions

-t-Increase rain

-g-Decrease rain

-v-Earthquake

-Esc-Exit the game

PlayGod is an hybrid genetic and stream behavior based Ai experiment that I have done to a university class in 2017

It simulates a tribe of cubes learning to survive and evolving  through the generations while allowing the player to influence the world

Each cube posses 18 genes that controls the bases for theirs needs, stats and abilities

And the cubes stream behavior was implemented as a weight system to determine their actions. The weights changing accordingly with the stats of the owner cube
